00025 #ifndef SANGOMA_SNGLOGGER_H_
00026 #define SANGOMA_SNGLOGGER_H_

00030 // c system include files

00041 /*============================= NAME SPACE ================================= */
00042 
00043 namespace sangoma {
00044 
00045 
00046 typedef enum {
00047   TRACE_LOG_LEVEL=0,
00048   DEBUG_LOG_LEVEL,
00049   INFO_LOG_LEVEL,
00050   WARN_LOG_LEVEL,
00051   ERROR_LOG_LEVEL,
00052   FATAL_LOG_LEVEL,
00053   OFF_LOG_LEVEL
00054 } LogLevel;
00055 
00061 class Logger {
00062 public:
00063 
00065   virtual ~Logger() {}
00066 
00067   virtual bool Init(const char* logger_name,
00068                     sangoma::LogLevel ll = sangoma::INFO_LOG_LEVEL) = 0;
00069 
00070   virtual bool Init(const char* logger_name, 
00071                     sangoma::LogLevel ll, 
00072                     const char* properties_file) = 0;
00073 
00074   virtual void Log(LogLevel ll, const std::string message, const char* file,
00075                    uint32_t line) const = 0;
00076 
00077 }; // class Logger
00078 
00079 class TraceLogger {
00080 public:
00081 
00082   TraceLogger(const Logger& l, const std::string msg, const char* file, uint32_t
00083               line)
00084     : logger_(l), msg_(msg), file_(file), line_(line)
00085   {
00086     logger_.Log(TRACE_LOG_LEVEL, "entering " + msg_, file_, line_);
00087   }
00088 
00089   ~TraceLogger()
00090   {
00091     logger_.Log(TRACE_LOG_LEVEL, "exiting " + msg_, file_, line_);
00092   }
00093 
00094 private:
00095   const Logger& logger_;
00096   std::string msg_;
00097   const char* file_;
00098   uint32_t line_;
00099 };
00100

00103 } // namespace sangoma

00105 /*=========================== LOGGING MACROS =============================== */
00106 
00107 #define SNG_LOG(logger, log_level, log_event) \
00108   { \
00109     std::stringstream str_buf_; \
00110     str_buf_ << log_event; \
00111     logger.Log(log_level, str_buf_.str(), __FILE__, __LINE__); \
00112   }
00113 
00114 #define SNG_TRACE(logger, X) \
00115   SNG_LOG(logger, sangoma::TRACE_LOG_LEVEL, X);
00116 
00117 #define SNG_DEBUG(logger, X) \
00118   SNG_LOG(logger, sangoma::DEBUG_LOG_LEVEL, X);
00119 
00120 #define SNG_INFO(logger, X) \
00121   SNG_LOG(logger, sangoma::INFO_LOG_LEVEL, X);
00122 
00123 #define SNG_WARN(logger, X) \
00124   SNG_LOG(logger, sangoma::WARN_LOG_LEVEL, X);
00125 
00126 #define SNG_ERROR(logger, X) \
00127   SNG_LOG(logger, sangoma::ERROR_LOG_LEVEL, X);
00128 
00129 #define SNG_FATAL(logger, X) \
00130   SNG_LOG(logger, sangoma::FATAL_LOG_LEVEL, X);
00131 
00132 #define SNG_TRACE_SCOPE(logger, X) \
00133     std::stringstream str_buf_; \
00134     str_buf_ << X; \
00135     sangoma::TraceLogger __sng_trace_logger(logger, str_buf_.str(), __FILE__, __LINE__); 
00136 
00137 /*=========================== LOGGING MACROS =============================== */
